function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence of inactivation rate on pathogen type and environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ozone production as a by-product of uv-c radiation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks from direct exposure to uv-c radiation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of germicidal irradiation in building operations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate knowledge of germicidal irradiation extent in slovakia","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrealistic assumptions about the end of the pandemic peak","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased heat demand for continuous ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenge in achieving community immunity through vaccination due to rejection of vaccines and high pre-vaccination rate requirement.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to modify internal conditions leading to heat stress in humans and reduced resistance to infection.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 virus from humans to humans through infectious droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic patients with covid-19 releasing infectious droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sars-cov-2 virus remaining infectious on surfaces and in indoor air","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased recreational activity during the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution of prohibited indoor activities with outdoor activities","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical data on the impact of systemic shifts in urban design on inhabitants","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unequal access to green space may lead to unequal recreational opportunities and potential conflicts of interest.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of disease transmission through overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of reduced beneficial health effects due to overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of long-term resilience against future shocks being compromised by overcrowding in green spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Assumption of equal adoption of strava across cycling and pedestrian communities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of distinction between cyclists and pedestrians in ground-truth reference counters","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mitigation of mental health burden under pandemic conditions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias in strava adoption along socio-economic gradients","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogenous strava adoption over the city of oslo","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cycling activities on city trails with >75% tree canopy cover.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased pedestrian and cyclist activity in green areas during lockdown may lead to higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift from work-related commutes to recreational cycling outside the more densely built city center may lead to higher risk of disease transmission in recreational areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Greater pedestrian activity in green risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rise in unemployment and flexible work schedules leading to changes in recreational behaviors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in cycling activity during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of dsm and dtm data provided by the norwegian earth engine gee cloud computing platform may pose data security and privacy risks if adequate safeguards are not implemented.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Comparing activity levels during lockdown to baseline may not account for the impact of abnormal weather variations on recreational activity.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deviation in recreational activity levels during lockdown may not align with predicted levels based on weather conditions, leading to inaccurate assessments.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for spatial covariates and their impact on recreational activity assessment during segment.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of google search query data as proxy indicators may not fully capture outdoor recreational intention.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on strava data as a representation of recreational activity may not capture the full spectrum of users,
